author: David Weigel
title: Victories by Mastriano, Budd show potency of Trumps false stolen election claims in GOP

sentence: Hes not only the guy whipping his extremist supporters into a frenzy; hes among the frenzied, an insurrectionist who seems convinced of his righteousness and who has promised to make Ron DeSantis look like a moderate.
author: Eric Lutz
title: Doug Mastrianos GOP Primary Victory Puts Democracy on the Ballot in Pennsylvania
